name: part_007
file: tmp_【 #桃鈴ねね誕生日Live2025 】ゲストあり！新衣装お披露目あり！ねねリズムバースデーライブ！【 桃鈴ねね ⧸ hololive 】 [d-Ua7CIU34I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Momosuzu Nene, Shishiro Botan, and Yukihana Lamy perform the song 'Persona'.
After the performance, Nene, Botan, and Lamy address the audience and Polka, who is performing later.

subtitles.original: エンジョイ なんて 贅沢 言いませんか
subtitles.english: Why not say that enjoying yourself is a luxury?

subtitles.original: 今辿り着いた憧れの世界
subtitles.english: The world of my dreams I've finally reached

subtitles.original: ここはまるでペテン師の楽園
subtitles.english: It's like a swindler's paradise

subtitles.original: 吐き気を飲み込む
subtitles.english: Gulping down the nausea

subtitles.original: 全幕 幕が開けた そのオノマトペ
subtitles.english: The curtain rose on all acts with that onomatopoeia

subtitles.original: 着飾る人形はピエロに口付けを
subtitles.english: The dressed-up doll kisses the clown

subtitles.original: 本日大団円 脚本が笑う
subtitles.english: A grand finale today, the script is laughing

subtitles.original: 騙されてくれる あなた達と
subtitles.english: Together with you all who let me deceive you

subtitles.original: 私今ここで何をしてる
subtitles.english: What am I doing here right now?

subtitles.original: 耳を劈く 拍手喝采
subtitles.english: The ear-splitting applause

subtitles.original: ザルも踊ればヒトにもなれる
subtitles.english: If even a monkey dances, it can become human

subtitles.original: フォーカスされた日常 引き金を描いて
subtitles.english: A focused daily life, drawing the trigger

subtitles.original: 演ずるように
subtitles.english: As if performing

subtitles.original: 一回 二回 三回 嘘を重ねて
subtitles.english: Once, twice, thrice, piling up the lies

subtitles.original: 十回 千回 億回 瞳を逸らして
subtitles.english: Ten, a thousand, a hundred million times, averting my eyes

subtitles.original: 誰なんだっけかな 私は あれ
subtitles.english: Wait, who was I again? Oh...

subtitles.original: 飽和した 仮面 ぶっ飛んで
subtitles.english: The saturated mask flies off

subtitles.original: 独りと孤独なワルツでお出迎え
subtitles.english: Welcomed with a solo, lonely waltz

subtitles.original: 脱作の中
subtitles.english: Amidst the artifice

subtitles.original: あどけてみせて
subtitles.english: Try to look innocent

subtitles.original: あどけてみせて
subtitles.english: Try to look innocent

subtitles.original: あたしの世界はグルグル回ってく
subtitles.english: My world keeps spinning round and round

subtitles.original: 全幕 幕が開けた そのオノマトペ
subtitles.english: The curtain rose on all acts with that onomatopoeia

subtitles.original: 群がる人形はダリアの花束を
subtitles.english: The swarming dolls hold bouquets of dahlias

subtitles.original: 選んでくれた服を着て踊りましょう
subtitles.english: Let's dance wearing the clothes you chose for me

subtitles.original: 騙されてくれる あなた達と
subtitles.english: Together with you all who let me deceive you

subtitles.original: いいよ もう これが好きだっただけなのだ
subtitles.english: It's fine now, I just loved this, that's all

subtitles.original: 振り落とせ ペルソナを
subtitles.english: Shake off the persona

subtitles.original: 振り落とせ ペルソナを
subtitles.english: Shake off the persona

subtitles.original: 悲劇は喜劇と化してなお
subtitles.english: Even as tragedy turns into comedy

subtitles.original: 今日も普通に楽しかったよ
subtitles.english: Today was fun in the usual way

subtitles.original: さあ 括目してくれよ
subtitles.english: Now, keep your eyes on me

subtitles.original: 本当の僕は僕じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because the real me isn't me

subtitles.original: 今日も普通に楽しかったよ
subtitles.english: Today was fun in the usual way

subtitles.original: なぜ？
subtitles.english: Why?

subtitles.original: 全幕 幕が閉じた そのオノマトペ
subtitles.english: The curtain fell on all acts with that onomatopoeia

subtitles.original: 着せ替え人形と輪廻のアンコール
subtitles.english: A dress-up doll and the encore of reincarnation

subtitles.original: 本日大団円 脚本が笑う
subtitles.english: A grand finale today, the script is laughing

subtitles.original: どうしようもないよな
subtitles.english: There's nothing to be done, is there?

subtitles.original: どこを誰でもいい 調子に乗るなよと
subtitles.english: Anyone, anywhere, just tell me not to get ahead of myself

subtitles.original: ただ言い聞かせてくれ
subtitles.english: Just keep telling me that

subtitles.original: そういや夢も散々見てたな
subtitles.english: Come to think of it, I've had plenty of dreams

subtitles.original: もう後戻りは叶わないと
subtitles.english: Knowing there's no going back anymore

subtitles.original: 気づけばそこには一人で
subtitles.english: And I find myself there all alone

subtitles.original: 振り落とせ ペルソナを
subtitles.english: Shake off the persona

subtitles.original: どうせフィクションの物語
subtitles.english: It's just a fictional story anyway

subtitles.original: この物語はフィクションです。
subtitles.english: This story is a work of fiction.

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Hi there!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！ お疲れ様ー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Good job everyone!

subtitles.original: というわけで、おまるの「ペルソナ」を、ラミィと、ししろんと、歌いましたー！
subtitles.english: So, we sang Polka's 'Persona' together with Lamy and Shishiron!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: おまる見てるー？
subtitles.english: Polka, are you watching?

subtitles.original: おまる見てるー？
subtitles.english: Polka, are you watching?

subtitles.original: 頑張ってるよおまる！
subtitles.english: We're doing our best, Polka!

subtitles.original: 見とるかなー？
subtitles.english: I wonder if she's watching?

subtitles.original: 見てるのかな？ 見てはいない… 見れない… 見れないな…
subtitles.english: Is she? She's not... she can't... she can't watch right now...

subtitles.original: ステージ頑張ってね！
subtitles.english: Good luck with your stage performance!

subtitles.original: 頑張れー！
subtitles.english: Go for it!

subtitles.original: ねねたち、やり切ったよな、ペルソナ。
subtitles.english: We really gave it our all with Persona.

subtitles.original: やり切ったー！
subtitles.english: We sure did!

subtitles.original: いや、でもその前に、この新衣装について触れなくていいのー！？
subtitles.english: Wait, but before that, shouldn't we mention this new costume!?

subtitles.original: いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!
